languages.text: "Избавь меня от своих стенаний, ведьма. Каждый голос, что звучит в твоем сознании — шепот Архиврага!"
"Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"
languages.original_text: "Избавь меня от своих стенаний, ведьма. Каждый голос, что звучит в твоем сознании — шепот Архиврага!"

traits.locale_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “别再哭哭啼啼了，女巫！你脑子里听到的每个声音，都是混沌大敌的低语！”
languages.original_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: “别再哭哭啼啼了，女巫！你脑子里听到的每个声音，都是混沌大敌的低语！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Épargnez-moi vos lamentations, sorcière. Les voix qui résonnent dans votre esprit ne sont rien d'autre que des murmures du Grand Ennemi ! »
languages.original_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: « Épargnez-moi vos lamentations, sorcière. Les voix qui résonnent dans votre esprit ne sont rien d'autre que des murmures du Grand Ennemi ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Erspart mir Euer Gejaule, Hexe. Jede Stimme, die Ihr in Eurem Kopf hört, ist ein Flüstern des Erzfeinds!"
languages.original_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Erspart mir Euer Gejaule, Hexe. Jede Stimme, die Ihr in Eurem Kopf hört, ist ein Flüstern des Erzfeinds!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの嘆きは聞きたくない、魔女め…その心の声は、何もかもが渾沌の勢力の囁きだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの嘆きは聞きたくない、魔女め…その心の声は、何もかもが渾沌の勢力の囁きだろう！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Ahórrame los lamentos, bruja. ¡Las voces que resuenan en tu mente son los susurros del Archienemigo!».
languages.original_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: «Ahórrame los lamentos, bruja. ¡Las voces que resuenan en tu mente son los susurros del Archienemigo!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"

languages.text: "Feryatların nafile cadı. Zihninde yankılanan her ses, Şerbaşı'nın farklı bir fısıltısı!"
languages.original_text: "Spare me your wailing, witch — every voice that sounds in your mind is a whisper of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Feryatların nafile cadı. Zihninde yankılanan her ses, Şerbaşı'nın farklı bir fısıltısı!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
